mutants.code:
def calculate_minimum_network_cost(routers):
    n = len(routers)
    if n <= 2:
        return 0
    min_slots = min(routers)
    total_slots = sum(routers)
    min_cost = min_slots * (n - 2) + total_slots
    return min_cost

def calculate_minimum_network_cost(routers):
    n = len(routers)
    if n >= 2:
        return 0
    min_slots = min(routers)
    total_slots = sum(routers)
    min_cost = min_slots * (n - 2) + total_slots
    return min_cost

    n = len(routers)
    if n != 2:
        return 0
    min_slots = min(routers)
    total_slots = sum(routers)
    min_cost = min_slots * (n - 2) + total_slots
    return min_cost

    total_slots = sum(routers)
    min_cost = min_slots * (n - 2) - total_slots
